stimulusHtml:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.


Respond to parts a, b, and c.

  1. Briefly describe one way in which religion influenced European migration to the Americas from 1500 to 1700.

  2. Briefly explain one similarity in how religion influenced the development of two colonies in North America from 1600 to 1700.

  3. Briefly explain one difference in how religion influenced the development of two colonies in North America from 1600 to 1700.
